lom:description.lom:string: This is the science/business/medical cateogry of a larger collection of links to resources on African American history. This site has a large collection of links to African American inventors, entrepreneurs, architects, doctors, scientists and engineers. The full database is searchable by date (e.g., "what happened on your birthday"), keyword and name. There is also a database of poems or lyrics and sources. The general categories are: education, activist, Film/TV, music, episodes, theater/arts, literature, science/business/medical, politics/law, abolitionist, sports/outdoors, religion. There is a registry store, workshops, seminars and a daily newspaper.

lom:title.lom:string: African American Registry: Science, Engineering, Business and Medical
